comments.raw_text: Presently, getPtr32Target asserts if it is asked to extract a value that it doesn't know how to handle.  I'd like to be able to call it from getCF32Target (gets the target of a control flow sequence). However, calling it from get CF32Target would require that it returns a failure condition, rather than asserting.
